Readings

Please read sections 1.2 and 2.1.

Words of Advice

  • Differential Equations is largely about identification of the problem.
  • There'll be techniques to learn too, but knowing will be more than half the battle.

Work

  • In section 1.2, please do problems 1, 2a-e and g, 3 eop, 4 eop, 5ad, 7.
  • In section 2.1, please do problems 1-11 odd, 16, 17, 19, 20, 24, 31-33, 36, 47.
